title: Guided Meditation for Positive Energy, Relaxation, Peace - Lavendaire
author: Alice Lalicon
description: Enjoy this 20 minute guided meditation for positive energy, relaxation and peace, with an emphasis on gratitude, visualization and positive affirmations.
cleaned_text: Guided Meditation for Positive Energy, Relaxation, Peace [Download the audio for this guided meditation here! ](https://www.lavendaire.com/meditation-positive-energy) Enjoy this 20 minute guided meditation for positive energy, relaxation and peace, with an emphasis on gratitude, visualization and positive affirmations. This is a good meditation for beginners and all levels. I had so much fun making this, editing the meditation music together, and crafting a peaceful guided experience. Let me know what you think and if you'd like more of these! Resources How much do you really know about yourself? Discover more about yourself and what you want out of life with this free downloadable list of 30 self reflection journaling prompts.
